amendment.description: Amendment decreases funding for the Private Enforcement Initiative by $28.375 million and redirects the funds to the Administrative Enforcement Initiative in the Fair Housing Initiatives Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first reduce then increase funding within the Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity account by $28, 375,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stivers amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Stivers.
